name: csv-to-json
title: CSV to JSON Converter
description: Convert CSV rows into JSON objects with proper data structure
content:
Overview

This application converts CSV files into JSON format, creating an array of objects where each row becomes a JSON object with column headers as keys. Perfect for converting spreadsheet data into API-ready JSON format.

Features

  • Converts CSV rows to JSON objects
  • Uses column headers as JSON keys
  • Creates properly formatted JSON array
  • Preserves UTF-8 encoding and special characters

Parameters

  • Input CSV File: Upload your CSV file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the JSON output

Output

The application generates a JSON file named {original_name}.json containing an array of objects, with one object per CSV row.

Use Cases

  • Converting Excel/spreadsheet data to JSON
  • Preparing CSV data for APIs
  • Transforming tabular data into structured JSON
  • Creating JSON datasets from CSV exports
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && python prod_apps_clone/python/csv_to_json.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
